testsuite.name: pl.futurecollars.invoicing.db.FileBasedDatabaseTest

testcase.name: should return empty collection if there is no invoices in base
should return empty optional if there is no invoice with given id
should return invoices without deleted one
should throw illegalArgumentException if there is no id using update
should throw illegalArgumentException if there is no id using delete
should save data to right file
